alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 03 at 4:17AM EDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Florida, including the following county, Okaloosa. * WHEN...Until 730 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 314 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to storms repeatedly moving across the same areas with more storms potentially moving onshore in the next few hours. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in a short period of time this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Destin.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
